text:
Hello, I am looking for ""Long term"" not dating outside of the relationship, because I believe if you date more then one you can't focus your heart with someone truly and honestly. I'm a 50 yrs old, laid-back, easy-going, fun and exciting. I like to do pretty much anything and with the right person anything can be fun! I don't really have a particular "type" of girl but she must be self-confidence, a sense of humor! I'm new at this, never filled out one of these before but I'm tired of the game, I just want to meet somebody cool smart and fun !!! whom we can make the World our playground. I am down to earth, however I can be wild & have fun also. Someone is fun and likes to go out, good looking to talk to about anything. I am a out going person and always on time waiting. I am an honest, trustworthy man with high morals and family values. I like to laugh,and socialize and know how to treat a woman to feel loved and secure. I like to cuddle while watching movies, especially on rainy days, feeling cozy. I love to give unexpected gifts and treasure a commitment. I'm a homeowner and financially stable. I'm not sure what I'm looking for in a woman anymore. It keeps changing with each relationship that I've been in. I guess I'm looking for someone who I can talk to like my best friend, who is honest, and who is willing to go that extra mile for me like I would for her. Chemistry and attraction are important to me, too, but one doesn't outweigh the other. I think for me there has to be at least a little of each for it to work. I have learned a lot from my past relationships; about what I do and don't want in one. I don't play games because I have no need to. I am comfortable and confident with who I am. I can take care of myself but I would prefer to meet a great women and we can take care of each other. I appreciate the little things in a relationship that help to make and keep it special. Chemistry is key. When you find that certain something in another person and you can't get enough of them.... that's what I'm looking for. Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe and love as long as you live. Just a normal guy trying to find the right woman for me. I consider myself honest and polite, but I'm a total goof at times, too. I have a good sense of humor and I don't take life too seriously. I'm financially and mentally stable - lol. I've got a lot of good friends and I'm close to my family as well. I like animals a lot. I like the outdoors, the beach, movies, music/shows, going out to dinner, shooting pool, playing cards, home improvement projects, computers/gaming, sports, and a bunch of other things. I can listen to most any music and I'm not too picky about movies so long as there is good acting and a good plot. I try to eat healthy and work out on a regular basis. My job can be real busy at times, but I always have weekends off and I try not to bring work home with me. I like what I do for the most part, so that makes it a bit easier. I do have pic's only send on request. The pics are quick nothing fancy I do look better in person these just don't do anything for me, I am not photogenic. If you'd like to learn more about me, I'd love to hear from you. If you came this far in my profile and if you are a shallow person please just keep moving, I am not the one you want! "WHY IS THE SEARCH SO HARD TO FIND THE RIGHT ONE"? "OMG NO DRAMA HERE PLEASE" People have to let go of there past to move forward! I see this isn't easy! Please forward pics for response and will receive back in return.




To handle yourself; use your head. To handle others; use your heart. Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe and love as long as you live.

text:
I've posted something similar in the past, but it keeps getting flagged because I guess it's inappropriate to be interested in younger women. So, before you flag me, understand what I'm NOT looking for:
I'm not looking to be a sugar daddy, I'm looking for a relationship, not sex for money/things/whatever. Just because I'm older than you doesn't mean I'm interested in paying your rent.
On a similar note, I'm not going to be your "daddy", your "teacher" or anything similar. I certainly am not against experimentation and learning/teaching new things, I just don't like those particular role plays. 
Full on BDSM is not my thing, the Master/Slave thing can be okay in small doses, but not as a complete lifestyle choice.

What I AM looking for is a younger woman for a long term relationship, someone who is preferably under 30, who will not only be submissive to me sexually, but be my equal mentally (difficult to find even with women my age). I'm relatively attractive (I suppose it depends on which relative you ask), intelligent and funny, charming and entertaining, loyal and observant, sensual and strong. I'd certainly enjoy finding the equivalent kinds of characteristics and traits in a woman. Beyond that, you should be healthy and be d&d free, as I am. Non-smoker preferred, someone ideally smaller than me (I'm 5'9", about 185 pounds), the rest is negotiable. When you email me, tell me which picture you like above (the black & white one or the color one) and tell me why - I like them both, but just curious which one is more appealing to the rest of you out there, and it's a good spam filter.

One last thing: I seem to get a lot of replies from women who turn out to already be in some kind of relationship, and sometimes I find out early, sometimes late in the interactions. Please let me know right off if you're in a relationship. If you're married, you're in a relationship. If you're "working it out", you're in a relationship. If you're not sure if you're in a relationship, you're probably in a relationship. As I said, I'm not looking for a one off kind of thing, I am looking for something long term, and having another guy in the picture doesn't make it easy (having another girl in the picture might be different, and worth discussing, but more than likely, it won't work out in the long run). I'm single, I'm hoping you to be as well. Kids are okay.

title: "Why is it so Complicated?" Someone local.
text: Hello, I am looking for ""Long term"" not dating outside of the relationship, because I believe if you date more then one you can't focus your heart with someone truly and honestly. I'm a 50 yrs old, laid-back, easy-going, fun and exciting. I like to do pretty much anything and with the right person anything can be fun! I don't really have a particular "type" of girl but she must be self-confidence, a sense of humor! I'm new at this, never filled out one of these before but I'm tired of the game, I just want to meet somebody cool smart and fun !!! whom we can make the World our playground. I am down to earth, however I can be wild & have fun also. Someone is fun and likes to go out, good looking to talk to about anything. I am a out going person and always on time waiting. I am an honest, trustworthy man with high morals and family values. I like to laugh,and socialize and know how to treat a woman to feel loved and secure. I like to cuddle while watching movies, especially on rainy days, feeling cozy. I love to give unexpected gifts and treasure a commitment. I'm a homeowner and financially stable. I'm not sure what I'm looking for in a woman anymore. It keeps changing with each relationship that I've been in. I guess I'm looking for someone who I can talk to like my best friend, who is honest, and who is willing to go that extra mile for me like I would for her. Chemistry and attraction are important to me, too, but one doesn't outweigh the other. I think for me there has to be at least a little of each for it to work. I have learned a lot from my past relationships; about what I do and don't want in one. I don't play games because I have no need to. I am comfortable and confident with who I am. I can take care of myself but I would prefer to meet a great women and we can take care of each other. I appreciate the little things in a relationship that help to make and keep it special. Chemistry is key. When you find that certain something in another person and you can't get enough of them.... that's what I'm looking for. Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe and love as long as you live. Just a normal guy trying to find the right woman for me. I consider myself honest and polite, but I'm a total goof at times, too. I have a good sense of humor and I don't take life too seriously. I'm financially and mentally stable - lol. I've got a lot of good friends and I'm close to my family as well. I like animals a lot. I like the outdoors, the beach, movies, music/shows, going out to dinner, shooting pool, playing cards, home improvement projects, computers/gaming, sports, and a bunch of other things. I can listen to most any music and I'm not too picky about movies so long as there is good acting and a good plot. I try to eat healthy and work out on a regular basis. My job can be real busy at times, but I always have weekends off and I try not to bring work home with me. I like what I do for the most part, so that makes it a bit easier. I do have pic's only send on request. The pics are quick nothing fancy I do look better in person these just don't do anything for me, I am not photogenic. If you'd like to learn more about me, I'd love to hear from you. If you came this far in my profile and if you are a shallow person please just keep moving, I am not the one you want! "WHY IS THE SEARCH SO HARD TO FIND THE RIGHT ONE"? "OMG NO DRAMA HERE PLEASE" People have to let go of there past to move forward! I see this isn't easy! Please send pic without pic will not respond!

title: New Year, New Idea
text:
So I had an idea over the new year contemplating relationships, how they start and how they typically go. You know, we talk, go on dates, get to know each other then have sex and continue to grow and we all hope it leads to marriage and more. Now hear me out....Doing this typically has not worked out for me and if you're reading this you may being having the same problem. What if we turn this whole dating thing upside down....what if we started dating based on sex first, starting a relationship based our sexual desires and then see if our personalities fit. I know what you are thinking.....this guy is nuts, he's just trying to get laid and laying out a scenario that may work with some. But to be honest (believe me or not) I want more then just sex. I want a lasting relationship. 

So I am very open minded individual that likes to have fun. I enjoy going out and doing anything really. I like adventure and trying new things. I'm a huge craft beer enthusiast and lover of local small wineries. I love late nights talking over a bottle of wine or beers with good food and friends. I have a big heart and i feel i am an old soul. 

Id love to hear from you. Please be under 44, non to lite smoker and well single. Your pic for my pic. Write "new idea" in the subject line to help avoid spam.

text:
I am posting this ad for my daddy! So please sit back ... put your paws up ... 'cuz I am about to entertain you and put a smile on your face! 

My name is Gracie! 

I am a Shetland Sheepdog better known to most as a Sheltie or a baby Lassie! 

Lucky for me . . . I do get plenty of second looks and I love the attention! 
I am sort of my daddy's "chick magnet . . . or so he thinks! 

As you can see he has trained me well in all ways! (I can even type!) You will see that I take after my daddy! I say it as I see it!!! I just had my din din and now it's time for my nap!

He has no clue that I am doing this for him so please don't tell him! 
I really am looking for a nice woman for him so that she can be his "best friend" ... just like I am to him! 

I am smart and educated (Went to Puppy Kinder and Puppy High) ... and so is my daddy! I do plan on becoming a Therapy Dog when I grow up.

I am cute (Look at my picture!) ... and so is my daddy! 

I am short . . . only 18 inches high but my daddy is tall . . . 71 inches! 
I am still sort of a puppy but my daddy is fully grown!

I have one brown eye and one blue eye and my daddy has 2 bright green eyes! 

I weight about 24 pounds and my daddy weighs about 185 pounds! 

My hair color is sable and white and my daddies hair is brown and gray in it! Very distinguishing I should say! 

I have a few whiskers but my daddy has many! 

I don't have to work ... (I am a stay at home spoiled daughter!) but my daddy has a nice job and goes to work Monday thru Friday! I'm a more or less a daddy's girl! 

He drives me crazy on the weekends though 'cuz he takes me with him to go and run errands with him. But if I am a good girl, he will stop off and buy me an ice cream cone or take me to the doggie store for treats on our way home! He does make sure that he straps me into my doggie seat belt though!

I am very neat and clean ... and so is my daddy! 
He tends to be very organized which drives me crazy at times! 
He has me pick up my toys after I am done playing with them all the time!

I do not have children of my own ... and neither does my daddy! In fact, my daddy made sure that I could not have any kids . . . if ya know what I mean!

I have a great disposition . . . and my daddy has a great personality and a great attitude as well! 

I live in a big house that my daddy built for me a few years ago! I have 10 rooms ... and my daddy only has one! But he is the one that has to clean all 11 rooms though! I do help out around the house though . . .. and I make sure that I wipe my feet after coming in from outside! I also chase the squirrels off of my deck!

I have a very big yard to play in out in the country ... and my daddy curses every time he has to cut all the grass 'cuz I just sit on the deck and watch him! But I love to play with my balls on his freshly cut grass!

I have a big heart ... and so does my daddy! 
He tends to wear his heart on his sleeve though and I wear mine on my paws! 

I have never been hurt 'cuz my daddy protects me ... but my daddy has! 
My daddy is not bitter ... in fact he is very sweet! Very easy to get along with and easy to please!

My daddy really treats me well . . . and I am sure he will treat you even better if you take a chance! 

I don't bite . . . and neither does my daddy! We just nibble! 

If you scratch my tummy ... I will be your best friend! 
If you take a chance ... my daddy could possibly be yours! 

I would really like to find a special girl, woman and or lady for my daddy! 

I would hope that she is single, professional, attractive and cute, low maintenance, not have to wear a lot of make-up to look good, honest, respectful, employed, confident and most important, let me lie on her feet to keep them warm this coming winter! Hopefully her feet won't stink 'cuz then she would make me stink and my daddy would not like that at all! 

She must also want to be spoken for by me and my daddy! 

Oh ... she needs to be 5 to 6 years of age. That's in dog years! (Now you have to multiply those numbers by 7 'cuz for every 1 year in my age, you will be 7 years old! Do the math ... :-) 

She also needs to know what she wants and not afraid to go after it! But she needs to be willing to take a chance! 

I don't like drama ... and neither does my daddy! No baggage or horror stories please! 

She has to think I am cute and be willing to get to know me as well 'cuz I am part of the package! 

I don't ask for much and neither does my daddy! We are not selfish and would rather "give" than "receive"!

Well if you take a chance, I am quite sure that you will be pleasantly surprised! 

Like I said ... I am looking for my daddies significant other so that we can spend special moments with and perhaps live happily ever after! Oh ... my daddy loves to go on vacations ... and it would be nice if you like to as well. I can't go 'cuz my daddy says that I need a passport!

If you feel that you are up for a challenge, well please do take a chance and write me back! In doing so, please tell me all about yourself as well as a good way to contact you! Please don't be shy! 

I will make sure that I tell my daddy all about you and if he likes what he hears, well I am sure you will be hearing from him real soon! My daddy talks to me all the time when we are in the house together. I think he thinks that I am a person! I do like the attention though! 

And by the way . . . don't get any ideas 'cuz my daddy is NOT a Sugar Daddy but if you treat me right, I will make sure that he treats you even nicer! And remember ... my daddy really hates to type so please, no endless e-mails and NO DRAMA!!! 

Hope to hear from you soon! Got to go take my nap!

title: *********************LOOKING FOR SOMEONE TO SHARE LIFE WITH***********
text:
I want to find a woman that is sincere, honest, and most importantly faithful. I have been more than ready to settle down for some time and I am hoping I can find someone on here that I can share life's joys with and explore new places as well as try new things.

Let me just start off by telling you I have 2 kids and my daughter is 11 and my son is 7 so if you don't like kids please move on to the next person because they mean the world to me and its very important that you like kids.

I work as a bus driver and I like my job and the people I work with.

My biggest peeve is woman who respond without giving me a name to respond to.
That only leads me to believe you are not sincere or serious about starting a relationship.

I hope you are different. I hope you are sincere. I hope you are confident and secure,
and not afraid to send me a nice photo of your face.(The eyes have it for me) And MOST of all , I hope you are REAL.
I like a woman who takes care of herself, physically AND mentally, and doesn't waste her time with small talk, 
or idle chit-chat and gossip. Not into drama or soap opera lifestyles.
I'm not sure that there are any woman out there like that, but willing to keep looking.
I really don't want to waste time "chatting" or "texting". Although I realize some chatting and texting is necessary to get to know one another I do not want to go overboard with it
I would hope we are both here for the same reasons.

(If you've read this far, and seen my pic, you know I'm not your average guy, who posts
his private parts on Craigslist, in the hopes he will find a soul mate. Also, I'm not here for
a one night stand, nor do I care to spend countless hours, days or weeks, TRYING to get to know
someone over the internet.......Call me "Old-fashioned" )

I say, if two people are attracted to one another, (i.e. photos), there should be no reason why they couldn't meet 
for some intellectually stimulating conversation, and hopefully more, if there is a spark.
Honesty and Trust are KEY elements.
The club scene is not the place to be looking for a mate, and a waste of time in my opinion. 
I am a true believer in physical chemistry, and know what I'm looking for in a woman. 
That being said, I am not a "shallow" individual, NOR do I believe that looks are EVERYTHING,
but I do believe that there has to be a "SPARK" or a "TWINKLE", when our eyes meet. 
You obviously felt compelled to answer my post. Tell me why, and PLEASE be honest with me and yourself.
There is something to be said about Love at first sight. If you don't agree, maybe you should move on.

Having been married, I've learned from my mistakes, (we ALL make them),
and believe there is MUCH more to a relationship than JUST the physical chemistry.
I have a lot to offer , for the right woman. I've been called "frugal", but prefer "practical".
I consider myself a very resourceful individual in many aspects. (Also a handy man)
I am very giving, and always aware that there is someone out there, who is less fortunate than me. 
I thank God for all my blessings EVERY day, and just want someone to share them with.

title: WOW!!!!
text:
Being a man of reasonable intellect I decided to read some of the M4W adds as research to see what other men were posting and how best to compose mine.

In doing so it became very evident that I needed to instead write an apology to ALL the women out there who, for one reason or another, turned to CL in an attempt to find a decent man since I found nothing but debauchery, perversion, cheaters, and "daddies".

It is with that in mind that, on behalf of us regular, normal, and decent men (as few as there may apparently be) I offer my sincerest apologies to all women and completely understand the jaded "all the good ones are taken" mentality you have undoubtedly developed. 

That being said, I will forgo writing an actual post, again offer you my apologies for the myriad of BS you must face as a singe lady trying to find a man, and wish you the best of luck. Afterall, if there ever were any normal, safe, and sane women browsing here they probably already ran for the hills.

I am sort of my daddy's "chick magnet . . . or so he thinks! 

As you can see he has trained me well in all ways! (I can even type!) You will see that I take after my daddy! I say it as I see it!!! I just had my din din and now it's time for my nap!

He has no clue that I am doing this for him so please don't tell him! 
I really am looking for a nice woman for him so that she can be his "best friend" ... just like I am to him! 

I am smart and educated (Went to Puppy Kinder and Puppy High) ... and so is my daddy! I do plan on becoming a Therapy Dog when I grow up.

I am cute (Look at my picture!) ... and so is my daddy! 

I am short . . . only 18 inches high but my daddy is tall . . . 71 inches! 
I am still sort of a puppy but my daddy is fully grown!

I have one brown eye and one blue eye and my daddy has 2 bright green eyes! 

I weight about 24 pounds and my daddy weighs about 185 pounds! 

My hair color is sable and white and my daddies hair is brown and gray in it! Very distinguishing I should say! 

I have a few whiskers but my daddy has many! 

I don't have to work ... (I am a stay at home spoiled daughter!) but my daddy has a nice job and goes to work Monday thru Friday! I'm a more or less a daddy's girl! 

He drives me crazy on the weekends though 'cuz he takes me with him to go and run errands with him. But if I am a good girl, he will stop off and buy me an ice cream cone or take me to the doggie store for treats on our way home! He does make sure that he straps me into my doggie seat belt though!

I am very neat and clean ... and so is my daddy! 
He tends to be very organized which drives me crazy at times! 
He has me pick up my toys after I am done playing with them all the time!

I do not have children of my own ... and neither does my daddy! In fact, my daddy made sure that I could not have any kids . . . if ya know what I mean!

I have a great disposition . . . and my daddy has a great personality and a great attitude as well! 

I live in a big house that my daddy built for me a few years ago! I have 10 rooms ... and my daddy only has one! But he is the one that has to clean all 11 rooms though! I do help out around the house though . . .. and I make sure that I wipe my feet after coming in from outside! I also chase the squirrels off of my deck!

I have a very big yard to play in out in the country ... and my daddy curses every time he has to cut all the grass 'cuz I just sit on the deck and watch him! But I love to play with my balls on his freshly cut grass!

I have a big heart ... and so does my daddy! 
He tends to wear his heart on his sleeve though and I wear mine on my paws! 

I have never been hurt 'cuz my daddy protects me ... but my daddy has! 
My daddy is not bitter ... in fact he is very sweet! Very easy to get along with and easy to please!

My daddy really treats me well . . . and I am sure he will treat you even better if you take a chance! 

I don't bite . . . and neither does my daddy! We just nibble! 

If you scratch my tummy ... I will be your best friend! 
If you take a chance ... my daddy could possibly be yours! 

I would really like to find a special girl, woman and or lady for my daddy! 

I would hope that she is single, professional, attractive and cute, low maintenance, not have to wear a lot of make-up to look good, honest, respectful, employed, confident and most important, let me lie on her feet to keep them warm this coming winter! Hopefully her feet won't stink 'cuz then she would make me stink and my daddy would not like that at all! 

She must also want to be spoken for by me and my daddy! 

Oh ... she needs to be 5 to 6 years of age. That's in dog years! (Now you have to multiply those numbers by 7 'cuz for every 1 year in my age, you will be 7 years old! Do the math ... :-) 

She also needs to know what she wants and not afraid to go after it! But she needs to be willing to take a chance! 

I don't like drama ... and neither does my daddy! No baggage or horror stories please! 

She has to think I am cute and be willing to get to know me as well 'cuz I am part of the package! 

I don't ask for much and neither does my daddy! We are not selfish and would rather "give" than "receive"!

Well if you take a chance, I am quite sure that you will be pleasantly surprised! 

Like I said ... I am looking for my daddies significant other so that we can spend special moments with and perhaps live happily ever after! Oh ... my daddy loves to go on vacations ... and it would be nice if you like to as well. I can't go 'cuz my daddy says that I need a passport!

If you feel that you are up for a challenge, well please do take a chance and write me back! In doing so, please tell me all about yourself as well as a good way to contact you! Please don't be shy! 

I will make sure that I tell my daddy all about you and if he likes what he hears, well I am sure you will be hearing from him real soon! My daddy talks to me all the time when we are in the house together. I think he thinks that I am a person! I do like the attention though! 

And by the way . . . don't get any ideas 'cuz my daddy is NOT a Sugar Daddy but if you treat me right, I will make sure that he treats you even nicer! And remember ... my daddy really hates to type so please, no endless e-mails and NO DRAMA!!! 

Hope to hear from you soon! Got to go take my nap!!

Woooooooooooof 
Gracie

title: "Lifetime"
text:
Lets see! If you think about it, there have probably been tens of millions of personal ads posted in newspapers and magazines, and on bulletin boards or on the internet down through the years.

That's a lot of people looking for love, huh?

I find it very entertaining to see the best of these ads... I myself am fascinated with just how clever or touching some of them can be, or how comical or sarcastic. See, no matter how different we are, all over the world, there is one thing that still unites us in a very common way, and that's the fact that each and every one of us, no matter how messed-up or burned we have been in the past, we all still want to love, and be loved, more than just about anything in the world.

My name is Chris. I'm a SWM, 6', with a muscular build. I am a single father with custody and placement (No drama) I have been told that I am very nice-looking, sensitive, communicate well, and fun to be with. I feel 20 (but I'm not). I also act as though I enjoy single life (but I don't). What I am is 37 and tired of playing games. What I want is to be able to find someone to share those experiences in life which are best when shared. It would be nice if you were as beautiful physically as you are emotionally. However, the important word is "sincerity" and a willingness to give 100% in a relationship (as I am). I hope that we can become friends, and that you'll be interested enough to send a message. title: Butterflies
text:
Contrary to what other people might say, we are not all here looking for the same thing. Similar, yes, but identical, read my ad and then you tell me... 

I'm not miserable at home. I have a beautiful girlfriend. I'm not sexually deprived. I am not "trapped", I'm where I choose to be. So...then why am I posting an ad? Good question... 

I miss that "thing"...and by that I mean that feeling that you can't explain...the anticipation of seeing each other, kissing each other, wanting to tear each other's clothes off, having your heart race from a text message or an email...missing you when you're gone. 

I'm not married, but the fact is any long term relationship might as well be a marriage. You have all the same dowfalls of a marriage, with none of the benefits. You become comfortable with each other, stop doing things that make the other feel alive...and that's what I miss the most...having my breath taken away by another. 

I won't ask you to leave the person you're with...ever. I have dated married women in the past, and although I'm not solely looking to date married, they will receive slight bonus points from me simply because they understand being happy enough at home to not want to lose what they have, but being simultaneously deprived of something they may not be able to explain. 

Physically, I'm a pretty attractive guy. I'm tall (not 5'8 tall either, I mean over 6) but not 7ft, I'm big but not fat or a muscle head, blond and blue, and I'm a very romantic, patient lover who adores every inch of the female body. I am not a whore. If we "click" and decide to sleep together then you will be the only one besides my gf that I sleep with and I expect the same from you. I don't want a one night stand, I would rather have something that would last for years...even if we have to go a couple months without seeing each other. I'm not looking to get caught...I would rather miss you than turn our lives upside down.

I am a true believer in physical chemistry, and know what I'm looking for in a woman. 
That being said, I am not a "shallow" individual, NOR do I believe that looks are EVERYTHING,
but I do believe that there has to be a "SPARK" or a "TWINKLE", when our eyes meet. 
You obviously felt compelled to answer my post. Tell me why, and PLEASE be honest with me and yourself.
There is something to be said about Love at first sight. If you don't agree, maybe you should move on.

Having been married, I've learned from my mistakes, (we ALL make them),
and believe there is MUCH more to a relationship than JUST the physical chemistry.
I have a lot to offer , for the right woman. I've been called "frugal", but prefer "practical".
I consider myself a very resourceful individual in many aspects. (Also a handy man)
I am very giving, and always aware that there is someone out there, who is less fortunate than me. 
I thank God for all my blessings EVERY day, and just want someone to share them with.

title: The trouble with penises.
text:
I often wish I were female... If it weren't for enjoying my penis so much.
Herein lies the trouble with penises.
